Additionally I fixed some links that still pointed to `alibaba/weex`.

title: [android] remove special set layout parameter in baserefesh
body:
Layout is ignore is refresh component (both WXRefresh and WXLoading), when its parent is scrollable component. That will cause style do not working in these component.
Testcase: http://dotwe.org/weex/58c9fbbda7ddb368631602c1595a717b

title: [html5] fix scroller component scroll bug
body:
the scroller component prevents global touchmove event by default, so we can't scroll the whole page vertically when set scroll-direction to horizontal which we would rather not see.

I try to judge whether it is horizontal or vertical to choose whether to prevent the touchmove event.

<!--

Notes: Weex will move into Apache Software Foundation (ASF) on Feb 24 2017.

Our new GitHub repo is https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex

Thank you for your support.

title: [html5] fix vertical/horizontal scroll bug
body:
the scroller component prevents global `touchmove` event by default, so we can't scroll the whole page vertically when set `scroll-direction` to `horizontal` which we would rather not see.

I try to  judge whether it is horizontal or vertical  to choose whether to prevent the `touchmove` event.

title: * [android] fix ConcurrentModificationException in list sticky map
body:
```
java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
at java.util.HashMap$HashIterator.nextEntry(HashMap.java:806)
at java.util.HashMap$EntryIterator.next(HashMap.java:843)
at java.util.HashMap$EntryIterator.next(HashMap.java:841)
at com.taobao.weex.ui.component.list.BasicListComponent.(BasicListComponent.java:618)
at com.taobao.weex.ui.view.listview.adapter.WXRecyclerViewOnScrollListener.(WXRecyclerViewOnScrollListener.java:270)
at android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.(RecyclerView.java:3954)
at android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.(RecyclerView.java:3115)
at android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.(RecyclerView.java:2917)
```

@YorkShen

title: Fix pos fixed failed when parent is scroller
body:
Fix item with 'position:fixed' scroll with parent.
The reason of this bug is 'fixed' view will add to root node's view. So when the root is 'scroller','fixed' not working.
Testcase: http://dotwe.org/weex/a281d7db58ba73ef0a143535d3703bc4

title: * [android] fix the ConcurrentModificationException
body:
The exception:
![.png](https://ooo.0o0.ooo/2017/03/03/58b901868d7f7.png)    

Is due to one thread to modify the ArrayList while another thread is iterating over it, replacing the `ArrayList` with `CopyToWriteArrayList` should be able to solve it

title: * [Android] Fix 1px border radius
body:
Due to hardware-acceleration & 750px viewport & sub-pixel, border-radius of [some page](http://dotwe.org/weex/421b9ad09fde51c0b49bb56b37fcf955) will not be rendered. 

This commit try to fix the problem, using `Canvas.drawArc` instead of `Path.addArc` to skip hardware-acceleration behavior.
